safetyTips: Face Masks worn by staff. Hand Sanitiser in delivery drivers cars. Door step delivery offered. Social Distance working in large kitchen.
name: EL CIERVO TEX-MEX
address: Stag Coffee, 108-110 High Street, Ashford, Kent, TN24 8SD
description: El Ciervo the newest takeaway in Ashford, Kent. We deliver amazing homemade Mexican and American food to your door! Enjoy authentic dishes such as Tamales, Empanadas and Quesadillas or dig into one of our delicious Burgers or a Mac & Cheese! Mex up your takeout!  Order online or use our app and receive 20% off your order.
